headlines.description: Manchester City extended their lead at the top of the Premier League to six points after a thrilling 6-3 home win over Leicester City on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City hold off Leicester in nine-goal thriller

headlines.description: Bukayo Saka scored a brace as Arsenal eased to a 5-0 victory at Norwich City on Sunday to continue their bid for Champions League qualification.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saka nets brace as Arsenal rout Norwich

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur took the Boxing Day spoils with ease, beating 10-man Crystal Palace 3-0.
— West Ham’s slump continued as Jan Bednarek's late goal secured a rare away win for Southampton in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rare away win for Southampton as West Ham's slump continues

headlines.description: Striker Romelu Lukaku came off the bench and scored as Chelsea edged to a 3-1 away win over Aston Villa on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lukaku stars as Chelsea rally to beat Villa

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion ended their 11-game winless run in the Premier League with a 2-0 win over Brentford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton beat Brentford end barren 11-game winless run
